provides.name: collaborate
provides.description: Add a setting to turn collaboration mode on/off

provides.name: follow
provides.description: add to the list of users we are following, or (with no args) list the current set
provides.usage:
[username] ...

(username optional. Will list current followed users if not provided)

provides.name: unfollow
provides.description: remove from the list of users we are following
provides.completeText: username(s) of person(s) to stop following

provides.name: group
provides.description: Collect the people you follow into groups, and display the existing groups

provides.name: help
provides.usage:
The help gives you access to the various subcommands in the group command space.

You can narrow the search of a command by adding an optional search params.

Finally, pass in the full name of a command and you can get the full description, which you just did to see this!

provides.name: list
provides.description: List the current group and group members
provides.completeText: An optional group name or leave blank to list groups
provides.usage: List the current group and group members.

provides.name: add
provides.description: Add members to a new or existing group
provides.completeText: A group name followed by a list of members to add
provides.usage: Add members to a new or existing group

provides.name: remove
provides.description: Remove members from an existing group (and remove group if empty)
provides.completeText: A group name followed by a list of members to remove
provides.usage: Remove members from an existing group (and remove group if empty)

provides.name: share
provides.description: Manage the projects that you share to other users

provides.name: help
provides.usage:
The help gives you access to the various subcommands in the share command space.

You can narrow the search of a command by adding an optional search params.

Finally, pass in the full name of a command and you can get the full description, which you just did to see this!

provides.name: list
provides.completeText: An optional project name or leave blank to list shared projects

provides.name: remove
provides.description: Remove a share from the current shared projects
provides.completeText: A project name and a optional user or group (or leave blank for all users and groups)
provides.usage: Remove a share from the current shared projects.

provides.name: add
provides.description: Add a share to the current shared projects
provides.completeText: A project name or leave blank to list shared projects
provides.usage: Add a share to the current shared projects.
